md:
giải nghĩa từ "hats" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Hats**

* Noun: Mũ (một loại đồ dùng để che đầu)
* Example: She wore a beautiful hat to the party.
* Related words: cap, helmet, headgear, crown

**Hats** (in idioms)

* "Wear many hats" (đảm nhiệm nhiều vai trò): to have many responsibilities or jobs
* Example: As the manager of the company, she wears many hats, including HR and marketing.
* Related idioms: wear different hats, wear multiple hats

**Hats** (in phrases)

* "Take one's hat off to" (cảm phục ai): to show respect or admiration for someone
* Example: I take my hat off to her for completing the marathon.
* Related phrases: take off one's hat, tip one's hat

**Hats** (in expressions)

* "Pass the hat around" (đi quyên góp): to ask people to contribute money to a cause
* Example: The charity passed the hat around to raise funds for the disaster victims.
* Related expressions: pass the plate, pass the bucket

giải nghĩa từ "hats" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Hats

  • Noun: Mũ (một loại đồ dùng để che đầu)
  • Example: She wore a beautiful hat to the party.
  • Related words: cap, helmet, headgear, crown

Hats (in idioms)

  • "Wear many hats" (đảm nhiệm nhiều vai trò): to have many responsibilities or jobs
  • Example: As the manager of the company, she wears many hats, including HR and marketing.
  • Related idioms: wear different hats, wear multiple hats

Hats (in phrases)

  • "Take one's hat off to" (cảm phục ai): to show respect or admiration for someone
  • Example: I take my hat off to her for completing the marathon.
  • Related phrases: take off one's hat, tip one's hat

Hats (in expressions)

  • "Pass the hat around" (đi quyên góp): to ask people to contribute money to a cause
  • Example: The charity passed the hat around to raise funds for the disaster victims.
  • Related expressions: pass the plate, pass the bucket
